items.title: Powered by India’s small businesses, UK fintech Tide becomes a TPG-backed unicorn
items.standfirst: Tide serves over 1.6 million micro and small enterprises globally, with more than half of them based in India.
items.content: Tide serves over 1.6 million micro and small enterprises globally, with more than half of them based in India.

ai_summary: Tide, a UK-based neobank, raised $120 million in funding.
The funding round was led by TPG.
Tide's valuation is now $1.5 billion.
Over 1.6 million micro and small enterprises use Tide.
Half of Tide's users are based in India.

clusters.title: Trump says Lachlan and Rupert Murdoch might invest in TikTok deal
clusters.neutral_headline: Trump says Lachlan and Rupert Murdoch might invest in TikTok deal

items.title: Trump says Lachlan and Rupert Murdoch might invest in TikTok deal
items.standfirst: The Trump administration has been talking up a potential TikTok deal this weekend, with President Donald Trump telling Fox News on Sunday that Rupert Murdoch and his son Lachlan are "probably" going to be involved.
items.content: The Trump administration has been talking up a potential TikTok deal this weekend, with President Donald Trump telling Fox News on Sunday that Rupert Murdoch and his son Lachlan are "probably" going to be involved.

items.title: Trump says Rupert and Lachlan Murdoch likely part of US TikTok deal
items.standfirst: US president tells Fox News ‘a man named Lachlan is involved … that’s a very unusual name, Lachlan Murdoch’Rupert Murdoch and his son Lachlan Murdoch will probably be involved in the effort to buy TikTok in the US, Donald Trump said in an interview on Sunday.The president was asked about the status of the sale of the app during an interview with Peter Doocy on The Sunday Briefing on Fox News. Trump administration officials have signaled that a deal for the Chinese-owned social media platform was imminent, though there has been some confusion about the status of the agreement. Continue reading...
items.content: US president tells Fox News ‘a man named Lachlan is involved … that’s a very unusual name, Lachlan Murdoch’Rupert Murdoch and his son Lachlan Murdoch will probably be involved in the effort to buy TikTok in the US, Donald Trump said in an interview on Sunday.The president was asked about the status of the sale of the app during an interview with Peter Doocy on The Sunday Briefing on Fox News. Trump administration officials have signaled that a deal for the Chinese-owned social media platform was imminent, though there has been some confusion about the status of the agreement. Continue reading...

ai_summary: Donald Trump mentioned the Murdochs' potential involvement in a TikTok deal.
He stated Rupert and Lachlan Murdoch might be involved.
The Trump administration has discussed a TikTok deal.
The deal involves the sale of the social media platform.
Trump made the comments during a Fox News interview.

clusters.title: Microsoft’s Entra ID vulnerabilities could have been catastrophic
clusters.neutral_headline: Microsoft Entra ID vulnerabilities posed significant security risks

items.title: Microsoft’s Entra ID vulnerabilities could have been catastrophic

ai_summary: Microsoft's Entra ID had vulnerabilities that could have allowed attackers to access sensitive data.
Attackers could have potentially bypassed multi-factor authentication and gained unauthorized access.
The vulnerabilities were related to how Entra ID handled authentication and authorization processes.
Microsoft has released patches to address the identified security flaws within the system.
The company urged users to update their systems to mitigate potential risks from the vulnerabilities.

Individuals can explore his concepts by experimenting with different interface designs.
The article suggests ways to implement Raskin's ideas in modern computing environments.

The agency is working to minimize disruptions and maintain its mission objectives.

The price increase affects both the Xbox Series X and Xbox Series S consoles.
The company cited economic factors and production costs as reasons for the price hike.
This is the second time Microsoft has raised prices on its consoles this year.
The price increase may impact consumer demand for the Xbox consoles.

clusters.title: Chimps consume alcohol equivalent of nearly 2 drinks a day
clusters.neutral_headline: Chimps consume alcohol equivalent of nearly two drinks daily

items.title: Chimps consume alcohol equivalent of nearly 2 drinks a day

ai_summary: Chimpanzees in the wild consume alcohol equivalent to almost two drinks per day.
The alcohol comes from fermented fruits in their natural habitat.
Researchers have observed this behavior in chimpanzee populations.
The study provides insights into chimpanzees' dietary habits and preferences.
The findings raise questions about the effects of alcohol on chimpanzees.
